abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Wobbuffet from your hand onto Wynaut (this counts as evolving Wynaut), and remove all damage counters from Wynaut.

attacks.name: Alluring Smile
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon card or Evolution card for each Energy attached to Wynaut, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
